Installations et services

    LPPP-A6117/25
    DU: 29 12 2025 16:06 AU: 30 06 2026 23:59 EST
    A)  LPPT
    Q)  LPPC / QFAHW / IV / BO / A / 000/999 / 3846N00908W005
    E)  LPPT AD - MAJOR WORKS - EXTENSIONS OF APRON 10 AND NEW APRON
    23(PHASE 2A).
    REF AIP SUP 083/2024.
    TWY M1 RENAMED R1.
    TWY M2, BTN T1 AND Q1 RENAMED R2.
    TWY M2, BTN Q1 AND M3 RENAMED R3.
    THE CURRENT TEMPORARY PARKING AREA 351, WILL BE CLOSED AND DELIMITED
    WITH A FENCE TO PERMIT THAT WORKS GOING INSIDE DO NOT INTERFERE WITH
    AERODROME OPERATIONS.
    MARKINGS RELATED TO OLD INFRASTRUCTURE WILL BE PHYSICALLY REMOVED.
    ALL APRON 10 STANDS WILL BE TEMPORARILY REPLACED BY 4 TEMPORARY
    PARKING POSITIONS - 001, 002, 003 AND 004.
    TWY K CLOSED.
    NEW TEMPORARY SERVICE ROAD CONNECTING EAST SIDE AND WEST SIDE OF THE
    AERODROME, PARALLEL TWY R.
    TEMPORARY STANDS INS CHECKPOINT POSITIONS:
    STAND 001 INS COORD 384555.4328N 0090749.8072W, ELEV (M/AMSL) 101,
    PUSH BACK TO TAXILANE A1
    STAND 002 INS COORD 384559.2416N 0090748.2304W, ELEV (M/AMSL) 101,
    PUSH BACK TO TAXILANE A1
    STAND 003 INS COORD 384600.3000N 0090748.4932W, ELEV (M/AMSL) 101,
    PUSH BACK TO TAXILANE A1
    STAND 004 INS COORD 384601.9416N 0090748.9288W, ELEV (M/AMSL) 101,
    PUSH BACK TO TAXILANE A1
    PHASE 2A - EXECUTION OF NEW M1 TWY (INSIDE THE FENCE, DOES NOT
    INTERFERE WITH THE MANEUVERING AREA)
    ACTIVITIES: WORK TAKING PLACE WITHIN THE AREA DELIMITED BY FENCE
    (AREA 2A + 2B).

Aérodrome d'arrivée : EPWA CHOPINA W WARSZAWIE
Installations et services

    EPWW-A3460/25
    DU: 28 11 2025 10:27 AU: 28 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A)  EPWA
    Q)  EPWW / QFAXX / IV / NBO / A / 000/999 / 5210N02058E005
    E)  REF AIP IFR AD 2 EPWA 1-50 - CHANGE OF INFORMATION IN POINTS:
    SHOULD BE:
    7.1.2.1. LVP OPERATIONS WILL BE COMMENCED WHEN RVR TDZ ARR RWY FALLS
    BELOW 800M AND/OR ANY OF THE RVR FALLS BELOW 550 M AND/OR THE CLOUD
    CEILING FALLS TO OR BELOW 300 FT.
    7.1.2.2. LVP WILL BE TERMINATED WHEN RVR TDZ ARR RWY INCREASE TO
    800M OR MORE AND/OR ALL OF THE RVR INCREASE TO 550 M OR MORE AND THE
    CLOUD CEILING REACHES 300 FT OR MORE AND A CONTINUING IMPROVEMENT IS
    ANTICIPATED.
    INSTEAD OF:
    7.1.2.1. LVP OPERATIONS WILL BE COMMENCED WHEN ANY OF THE RVR FALLS
    BELOW 550 M AND/OR THE CLOUD CEILING FALLS BELOW 200 FT.
    7.1.2.2. LVP WILL BE TERMINATED WHEN ALL OF THE RVR INCREASE OVER
    550 M AND THE CLOUD CEILING REACHES 200 FT OR MORE AND A CONTINUING
    IMPROVEMENT IS ANTICIPATED.

    EPWW-P3460/25
    DU: 28 11 2025 10:29 AU: 28 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A)  EPWA
    Q)  EPWW / QFAXX / IV / NBO / A / 000/999 / 5210N02058E005

    PONIZEJ 800M I/LUB KTORYKOLWIEK RVR SPADNIE PONIZEJ 550 M I/LUB
    PULAP CHMUR SPADNIE DO LUB PONIZEJ 300 FT.
    7.1.2.2. ODWOLANIE LVP NASTAPI, GDY RVR TDZ ARR RWY WZROSNIE DO LUB
    POWYZEJ 800M I/LUB WSZYSTKIE RVR WZROSNA DO LUB POWYZEJ 550 M I
    PULAP CHMUR WZROSNIE POWYZEJ 300FT ORAZ JEST TENDENCJA DO DALSZEJ
    POPRAWY.

    PONIZEJ 550 M I/LUB PULAP CHMUR SPADNIE PONIZEJ 200 FT.

    550 M I PULAP CHMUR WZROSNIE DO 200 FT LUB POWYZEJ ORAZ JEST
    TENDENCJA DO DALSZEJ POPRAWY.

    LIIA-E1428/25
    DU: 13 06 2025 17:27 AU: PERM
    A) LIBB LIMM LIRR
    Q) LIXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/188 / 4119N01321E999
    E) FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY IS REGULATED AS FLW:
    -AIRCRAFT NOT INVOLVED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS MUST NOT
    FLY OVER THE FIRE AREA AND MUST EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION
    WHEN FLYING NEAR IT, CONSIDERING THE POSSIBLE INTERVENTION
    OF FIREFIGHTING ACFT.
    THEREFORE, WHEN AN AERIAL FIREFIGHTING OPERATION IS
    ANNOUNCED/ACTIVE, IT IS PROHIBITED TO FLY IN THE ZONES IDENTIFIED
    BY THE FIRE-FIGHTING AUTHORITIES AND NOTIFIED BY THE COMPETENT
    AUTHORITY OR, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC PROVISIONS:
    I. WITHIN CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, IN THE ABSENCE OF SPECIFIC
    COMMUNICATIONS ABOUT THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE FIREFIGHTING
    OPERATIONS FROM THE ENGAGED ACFT, BELOW 760M (2500FT) AGL
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 4KM
    (2 NM) FROM THE FIRE
    II. OUTSIDE CONTROLLED AIRSPACE, BELOW 900M (3000FT) AGL,
    WITHIN AN AREA EXTENDING UP TO A HORIZONTAL DISTANCE OF 9KM
    (5NM) FROM THE FIRE.
    -TIMELY UPDATES REGARDING THE ZONES AND AREAS AFFECTED
    CAN BE BROADCAST ON GROUND/AIR/GROUND FREQUENCIES.
    -THE ENGAGED FIREFIGHTING AIRCRAFT KEEP THE ATS UNIT
    RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AFFECTED AREA INFORMED ABOUT THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS AND THEIR CONCLUSION.
    -THE ATS UNIT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE AREA AFFECTED BY THE
    FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS PROVIDES AIR TRAFFIC SERVICES, AS FAR
    AS POSSIBLE:
    1.TO THE AIRCRAFT ENGAGED IN FIREFIGHTING OPERATIONS, EXCEPT
    IN THE FIREFIGHTING AREA WHERE IT PROVIDES ONLY FLIGHT INFORMATION
    AND ALERT SERVICES.
    RMK: IF A CTR IS AFFECTED BY THE FIRE, SID/STAR/INSTR APCH PROC COULD
    BE TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED OR MODIFIED
    2.TO OTHER GAT FLIGHTS, BASED ON THE INFORMATION AVAILABLE REGARDING
    THE FIREFIGHTING ACTIVITY, WHICH MAY STILL BE INCOMPLETE.
    REF AIP ENR 1.1.1.4 'POLICE, CUSTOMS AND PATROL FLIGHTS ENGAGED IN
    URGENCY MISSIONS', PARAGRAPH C 'FIREFIGHTING'

    ISSUED BY ITALY, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR

    WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN ITALY SHALL EXERCISE ENHANCED
    CAUTION WHEN OVERFLYING NICOSIA FIR (LCCC) DUE TO MONTHLY PLANNED
    FIRING EXERCISES. IT IS REQUESTED TO CAREFULLY FOLLOW
    INSTRUCTIONS FROM CYPRUS AUTHORITIES PROVIDING AIR TRAFFIC
    MANAGEMENT AND TO PAY PARTICULAR ATTENTION TO RESTRICTIONS OR
    INTERDICTIONS PUBLISHED BY CYPRUS AUTHORITIES.

    FIR SIMFEROPOL UKFV, FIR ODESA UKOV, FIR ROSTOV NA DONU URRV.

    WITHIN BUFFER ZONE EXTENDED OUT 200NM ALONG UKRAINE RUSSIA BORDER.

    IN COMPLIANCE WITH AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS
    ISSUED BY REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. OPERATORS ARE ALSO REMINDED
    THAT FLIGHT OPS WITHIN MINSK FIR UMMV ARE PROHIBITED  AND
    THAT ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS
    SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING IN FIR UUWV, FIR ULLL, FIR USSV,
    FIR UWWW IN ACCORDANCE WITH EASA SAFETY DIRECTIVES

LPPC FIR LISBOA FIR - LPPO FIR SANTA MARIA OCEANIC FIR

    LPPP-A0388/26
    DU: 29 01 2026 22:47 AU: 16 02 2026 23:59
    A) LPPC LPPO
    Q) LPXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 3100N02417W999
    E) UNTIL 16 FEBRUARY 2026, PORTUGUESE CIVIL AIR OPERATORS ARE
    STRONGLY ADVISED TO AVOID ALL FLIGHT OPERATIONS WITHIN THE MAIQUETIA
    FIR (SVZM).
    THIS RECOMMENDATION IS ISSUED DUE TO A HEIGHTENED RISK TO CIVIL
    AVIATION RESULTING FROM THE INCREASINGLY UNPREDICTABLE OPERATING
    ENVIRONMENT IN THE REGION, INCLUDING:
    -INCREASED, SUDDEN AND UNCOORDINATED STATE AND MILITARY AIRCRAFT
    ACTIVITY,
    -THE DEPLOYMENT AND PRESENCE OF ADVANCED AIR-DEFENCE SYSTEMS CAPABLE
    OF ENGAGING TARGETS AT ALL ALTITUDES,
    -GNSS INTERFERENCE AND OTHER NAVIGATION DISRUPTIONS,
    -POTENTIAL FOR MISIDENTIFICATION, SHORT-NOTICE AIRSPACE CHANGES AND
    REDUCED DIVERSION OPTIONS IN PARTS OF THE REGION.
    THESE CONDITIONS SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASE OPERATIONAL UNCERTAINTY FOR
    CIVIL AIRCRAFT OPERATING WITHIN OR TRANSITING THE AFFECTED AIRSPACE
    AND MAY POSE A SERIOUS THREAT TO FLIGHT SAFETY.
    PORTUGUESE CIVIL AIR OPERATORS ARE ALSO ADVISED TO EXERCISE CAUTION
    AND IMPLEMENT CONTINGENCY PLANNING FOR OPERATIONS AND ROUTE PLANNING
    WITHIN THE AIRSPACE OF FIR SAN JUAN (TJZS), FIR CURACAO (TNCF) AND
    FIR PIARCO (TTZP) WEST OF 057W.
    DUE TO POTENTIAL SPILLOVER RISKS RELATED TO THE DEPLOYMENT AND
    POSSIBLE USE OF MILITARY ASSETS IN THE REGION, PORTUGUESE CIVIL AIR
    OPERATORS SHOULD CLOSELY MONITOR AIRSPACE DEVELOPMENTS AND COMPLY
    WITH ALL AVAILABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS RELEVANT TO THE AREA.
    EMERGENCY PROVISIONS: IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY REQUIRING
    IMMEDIATE ACTION TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF THE FLIGHT, THE
    PILOT-IN-COMMAND IS AUTHORIZED TO DEVIATE FROM THIS ADVISORY AS
    NECESSARY TO ADDRESS THE SITUATION.

LECM FIR MADRID FIR - LECB FIR BARCELONA FIR

    E) IN ACCORDANCE WITH COUNCIL DECISION (CFSP) 2021/908 , PERMISSION
    TO LAND IN, TAKE-OFF FROM OR OVERFLY THE TERRITORY OF SPAIN SHALL
    BE DENIED TO ANY AIRCRAFT OPERATED BY BELARUSIAN AIR CARRIERS,
    INCLUDING AS A MARKETING CARRIER IN CODE-SHARING OR BLOCKED-SPACE
    ARRANGEMENTS.

    LANDING OR AN EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT. SPANISH AUTHORITIES MAY
    DETERMINE NOT APPLICABILITY OF THE PARAGRAPH ABOVE WHEN A
    LANDING, TAKE-OFF OR OVERFLIGHT IS REQUIRED FOR HUMANITARIAN
    PURPOSES OR ANY OTHER PURPOSES.

    LEAN-B8780/25
    DU: 13 11 2025 15:54 AU: 16 02 2026 23:00 EST
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION:

    ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED
    BY CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING
    AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY SPANISH
    AIRSPACE EXCEPT HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY
    RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE SPANISH
    AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY
    OVERFLIGHT. REQUESTS FOR HUMANITARIAN FLIGHTS SHALL BE SENT TO
    THE CONCERNED SPANISH AIRPORT OPERATOR.

    DU: 30 01 2026 13:24 AU: 16 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LECM LECB
    Q) LEXX / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4220N00345W433
    E) UNTIL FEBRUARY 16, 2026, SPANISH CIVIL AIR OPERATORS ARE STRONGLY
    ADVISED NOT TO CONDUCT ANY FLIGHT IN THE AIRSPACE WITHIN THE
    MAIQUETIA FIR (SVZM), DUE TO THE POTENTIAL RISK TO CIVIL AVIATION
    FROM INCREASED MILITARY ACTIVITY, ANTI-AIRCRAFT WEAPONS CAPABLE AT
    ALL ALTITUDES, AND LACK OF COORDINATION BETWEEN THE PARTIES TO THE
    CONFLICT.

    DECISION AND ACTION FOR THE SAFETY OF THE FLIGHT, THE PILOT IN
    COMMAND MAY DEVIATE FROM THIS NOTAM TO THE EXTENT NECESSARY TO
    ADDRESS THAT EMERGENCY.

    THIS SHOULD BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT DURING FUEL CALCULATION FOR
    FLIGHT.

    EPWW-C0055/26
    DU: 23 01 2026 08:33 AU: 23 04 2026 23:59 EST
    A) EPWW
    Q) EPWW / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5202N01855E999
    E) MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION.
    POLISH AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN POLAND
    SHALL NOT ENTER UIR KYIV(UKBU),FIR LVIV (UKLV),FIR KYIV (UKBV), FIR
    DNIPROPETROVSK (UKDV), FIR SIMFEROPOL (UKFV), FIR ODESA (UKOV), FIR
    ROSTOV (URRV).
    SAID OPERATORS AND AICRAFT OWNERS SHALL ALSO AVOID FLIGHT OPERATIONS
    WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200NM ALONG THE
    UKRAINE AND RUSSIA BORDER.
    OPERATIONS WITHIN THE FIR CHISINAU (LUUU) AIRSPACE SHALL ONLY BE
    UNDERTAKEN WITH APPLICABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY
    REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA.
    ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE
    TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING IN FOLLOWING AIRSPACE:
    MOSCOW (UUWV).

UMMV FIR MINSK FIR

    UMMD-O1179/25
    DU: 19 11 2025 08:40 AU: 17 02 2026 21:00
    A) UMMV
    Q) UMMV / QAFXX / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 5314N02742E186
    E) FOR THE PROTECTION OF NATIONAL INTERESTS OF THE REPUBLIC OF
    BELARUS, AIRCRAFT ENTERING MINSK FIR FROM WARSAW FIR, VILNIUS FIR,
    AND RIGA FIR ARE PERMITTED TO PERFORM TRANSIT FLIGHT OVER MINSK FIR
    ONLY. THE MENTIONED AIRCRAFT ARE PERMITTED TO LAND AT AERODROMES OF
    THE REPUBLIC OF BELARUS ONLY WHEN A SPECIAL FLIGHT PERMIT IS ISSUED
    BY THE MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS OF THE REPUBLIC OF BELARUS, EXCEPT
    FOR EMERGENCY OR UNFORESEEN SITUATIONS IN FLIGHT INCLUDING
    DIVERSIONS, OR LANDING FOR THE PURPOSE OF SEARCH AND RESCUE
    OPERATIONS OR BUSINESS AVIATION FLIGHTS. FOR AIRCRAFT DEPARTING FROM
    AERODROMES OF THE REPUBLIC OF BELARUS, EXIT FROM MINSK FIR TO WARSAW
    FIR, VILNIUS FIR, AND RIGA FIR MAY ONLY BE CARRIED OUT WHEN A SPECIAL
    FLIGHT PERMIT IS ISSUED BY THE MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS OF THE
    REPUBLIC OF BELARUS, EXCEPT FOR EMERGENCY OR UNFORESEEN SITUATIONS IN
    FLIGHT, DEPARTURES AFTER DIVERSION OR LANDING FOR THE PURPOSE OF
    SEARCH AND RESCUE OPERATIONS OR BUSINESS AVIATION FLIGHTS

    EDMMZUG, EDMMTEG, EDMMTRU AND EDMMSTA ARE NOT AFFECTED.

    HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN-FLIGHTS WITH THE
    PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE ITALIAN AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF

LSAS FIR SWITZERLAND FIR

    LSSN-A0676/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS
    ALL ACFT AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC)
    ISSUED BY BELARUSIAN AUTHORITIES PROHIBITED TO USE SWISS AIRPORTS EXC
    WITH PERMISSION OF APPROPRIATE AUTHORITIES OF SWITZERLAND AND IN
    CASE OF EMERG LDG. FLT WITH A VALID DIPLOMATIC CLR NOT AFFECTED.

    LSSN-A0677/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) UKRAINIAN CRISIS
    1. ALL AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED, OPERATED OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED
    BY CITIZENS OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AND ALL OPERATORS HOLDING AIR
    OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION
    AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY THE
    SWISS AIRSPACE EXC HUMANITARIAN FLT, SEARCH AND RESCUE FLT AND
    LEASED ACFT ONE-WAY RTN FLT WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE
    SWISS AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LDG OR EMERGENCY
    OVERFLIGHT.
    FLIGHTS WITH A VALID DIPLOMATIC CLEARANCE NOT AFFECTED.
    2. AIRCRAFT OPERATORS OF NON-SCHEDULED FLT BETWEEN RUSSIA AND
    SWITZERLAND, OPERATED DIRECTLY OR VIA A THIRD COUNTRY, MUST NOTIFY
    ALL RELEVANT INFORMATION CONCERNING THE FLT PRIOR TO THEIR OPERATION
    AND AT LEAST 48 HR IN ADVANCE TO THE FEDERAL OFFICE OF CIVIL
    AVIATION. CONTACT FOR NOTIFICATION AND DOCUMENTS
    WWW.BAZL.ADMIN.CH/AVIATIONSANCTIONS.

    LSSN-A0678/25
    DU: 14 11 2025 12:51 AU: 12 02 2026 23:59 EST
    A) LSAS
    Q) LSAS / QOECH / IV / NBO / E / 000/999 / 4645N00808E999
    E) SWISS AIR CARRIERS AND COMMANDERS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR
    SERVICE MANAGED BY CARRIERS HOLDERS OF OPERATING LICENCE ISSUED BY
    SWITZERLAND, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR DE FACTO
    CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICE WITH COMMERCIAL CHARTER AGREEMENT
    OR WITH CODE SHARING AND TO ALL FLIGHT PERFORMED WITH SWISS AIRCRAFT
    REGISTRATION, ARE REQUESTED TO CONSULT EASA SIB-2021-10 AND ARE
    REQUESTED TO AVOID MINSK FIR (UMMV).
    FOREIGN AIR CARRIERS INBOUND SWITZERLAND ARE RECOMMENDED TO AVOID
    MINSK FIR (UMMV).

LFLB CHAMBERY AIX LES BAINS

    LFFA-A6818/25
    DU: 13 12 2025 00:00 AU: 19 04 2026 23:59
    A) LFLB
    Q) LFMM / QATXX / IV / NBO / AE / 000/115 / 4545N00555E021
    E) FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES:
    1. FACILITATION HORAIRE EN VIGUEUR SUR L'AEROPORT DE CHAMBERY :
    SAM DIM, 22 26 29 DEC, 02 JAN, 13 20 27 FEV, 06 MAR
    - SE REFERER A L'AIP AD 2 LFLB AD2.23.3 POUR LES MODALITES
    D'APPLICATION.
    - TOUS LES VOLS IFR NECESSITENT L'OBTENTION D'UN NUMERO D'AUTORISATION AUPRES DE L'EXPLOITANT.
    - DEPOT FPL Y A DESTINATION DE LFLB INTERDIT PENDANT LES HORAIRES ATS
    SAUF AERONEFS BASES CAUSE GESTION DES FLUX DE TRAFIC
    - VOLS ENTRAINEMENT IFR DANS LA TMA CHAMBERY INTERDITS
    - VOLS IFR MONOMOTEUR A PISTONS INTERDITS
    - CHAMBERY NE PEUT PAS ETRE CHOISI COMME TERRAIN DE DEROUTEMENT SAUF
    URGENCE DECLAREE.
    - LES APPROCHES AUX INSTRUMENTS SONT RESERVEES AUX AERONEFS A
    DESTINATION DE LFLB SAUF URGENCE DECLAREE.
    - VOLS VFR :
    .LE NOMBRE DE VOLS VFR EST LIMITE EN FONCTION DU TFC CHARTERS SKI.
    .ATTENTE AVANT DE PENETRER L'ESPACE DE CLASSE D.
    .ENTRAINEMENT INTERDIT.
     .VFR NON-BASES : EN RAISON DE LA CAPACITE D'ACCUEIL REDUITE,
    VERIFIER LA DISPONIBILITE STATIONNEMENT AVANT LE VOL EN CONTACTANT
    L'EXPLOITANT UNIQUEMENT PAR E-MAIL : HANDLING(A)CHAMBERY-AIRPORT.COM
    2. EN DEHORS DES JOURS DE FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES :
    LUN-VEN SAUF: 22 26 29 DEC, 02 JAN, 13 20 27 FEV, 06 MAR
    - OBTENTION D'UN NUMERO D'AUTORISATION AUPRES DE L'EXPLOITANT VIA
    MYHANDLING AU PLUS TARD 48HR A L'AVANCE POUR LES IFR.
    - NUMERO DE CONFIRMATION COMMUNIQUE AU DEMANDEUR PAR L'EXPLOITANT A
    REPORTER EN CASE 18 DU FPL.
    - VOLS D'ENTRAINEMENT IFR DANS LA TMA SOUMIS A AUTORISATION PREALABLE
    DE L'ATC DE CHAMBERY.
    - RISQUE D'ATTENTE POUR LES VFR AVANT AUTORISATION D'INTEGRER
    L'ESPACE DE CLASSE D.
    - AERONEFS NON-BASES (IFR SANS ASSISTANCE ET VFR) : EN RAISON DE LA
    CAPACITE D'ACCUEIL REDUITE, VERIFIER LA DISPONIBILITE DE
    STATIONNEMENT AVANT LE VOL EN CONTACTANT L'EXPLOITANT UNIQUEMENT PAR
    E-MAIL : HANDLING(A)CHAMBERY-AIRPORT.COM

    A) LFLP
    Q) LFMM / QACXX / IV / NBO / AE / 000/040 / 4556N00606E008
    E) 1.FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES EN PERIODE HIVERNALE :
    SAM DIM, DEC 22 26 29, JAN 02, FEV 13 20 27, MAR 06
    - DEPOT DE FPL Y A DESTINATION DE LFLP INTERDIT PENDANT LES HORAIRES
    ATS CAUSE GESTION DES FLUX DE TRAFIC A L'EXCEPTION DES AERONEFS BASES
    - VOL IFR MONOMOTEUR A PISTONS SOUMIS A AUTORISATION PREALABLE DU
    CONTROLE
    - TOUS LES VOLS IFR NECESSITENT L'OBTENTION D'UN PPR AUPRES DE
    L'EXPLOITANT
    - ANNECY NE PEUT ETRE CHOISI COMME AD DE DEROUTEMENT SAUF URGENCE
    DECLAREE
    - LES APPROCHES AUX INSTRUMENTS SONT RESERVEES AUX AERONEFS A
    DESTINATION DE LFLP SAUF URGENCE DECLAREE
    - VOLS ENTRAINEMENT IFR INTERDIT DANS LA TMA CHAMBERY
    - VOLS VFR : LIMITE EN FONCTION DU TRAFIC CHARTERS SKI ET RISQUE
    D'ATTENTE AVANT DE PENETRER DANS LA CTR
    - VFR NON BASES : STATIONNEMENT LIMITE AUX POSTES 71, 72 ET 73, CONTACTER L'EXPLOITANT POUR VERIFIER LA DISPONIBILITE DU
    STATIONNEMENT AVANT D'EFFECTUER LE VOL
    - VERIFIER LA PUBLICATION PAR NOTAM DE RESTRICTIONS SUPPLEMENTAIRES
    2.HORS JOURS DE FACILITATIONS D'HORAIRES EN PERIODE HIVERNALE :
    LUN-VEN SAUF : DEC 22 26 29, JAN 02, FEV 13 20 27, MAR 06
    - VOLS D'ENTRAINEMENT IFR SOUMIS A AUTORISATION PREALABLE DU CONTROLE
    - RISQUE D'ATTENTE POUR LES VFR AVANT D'INTEGRER LA CTR DE CLASSE D
    - VOLS D'ENTRAINEMENT VFR DANS LA CTR SOUMIS A AUTORISATION PREALABLE
    DU CONTROLE
    - VOLS VFR NON BASES : STATIONNEMENT LIMITE AUX POSTES 71, 72 ET 73,CONTACTER L'EXPLOITANT AVANT D'EFFECTUER LE VOL POUR VERIFIER LA
    DISPONIBILITE SI DUREE STATIONNEMENT PREVU SUPERIEUR A 12HR
    - VERIFIER LA PUBLICATION PAR NOTAM DE RESTRICTIONS SUPPLEMENTAIRES
    CONTACT DE L'EXPLOITANT AD :
    - SEAAM
    - TEL : 04 50 27 30 06

LFBB FIR BORDEAUX

    LFFA-R2358/25
    DU: 28 10 2025 00:00 AU: 27 04 2026 23:59
    A) LFBB
    Q) LFBB / QROLP / IV / NBO / W / 000/036 / 4544N00217E008
    E) ZONE INTERDITE TEMPORAIRE (ZIT) 'LA COURTINE' - LUTTE ANTI DRONE :
    1. LIMITES LATERALES :
    IDENTIQUES A LA LF-R203A LA COURTINE PUBLIEE A L'AIP ENR 5.1.
    2. STATUT :
    ZONE INTERDITE TEMPORAIRE QUI COEXISTE AVEC LES PORTIONS DES ESPACES
    AERIENS AVEC LESQUELLES ELLE INTERFERE.
    3. CONDITIONS DE PENETRATION :
    - PENETRATION INTERDITE A TOUT AERONEF SANS EQUIPAGE A BORD,
    A L'EXCEPTION DES AERONEFS SANS EQUIPAGE A BORD EFFECTUANT DES
    ACTIVITES MILITAIRES, DE DOUANES, DE POLICE, DE RECHERCHE ET SAUVETAGE, DE LUTTE CONTRE L'INCENDIE, DU TRANSPORT MEDICAL AYANT A INTERVENIR DANS LE CADRE DE L'EXECUTION DE LEURS MISSIONS ET LORSQUE CELLES-CI NE PERMETTENT PAS LE CONTOURNEMENT DE LA ZONE.
    - DEROGATION SOUMISE A L'ACCORD DE L'AUTORITE GESTIONNAIRE AVEC
    UN PREAVIS DE 30 JOURS.
    4. SERVICES RENDUS :
    LES SERVICES RENDUS SONT CONFORMES A LA CLASSE DES PORTIONS DES
    ESPACES AERIENS AVEC LESQUELLES LA ZIT COEXISTE.
    5. ORGANISME A CONTACTER :
    - GROUPEMENT DE CAMP DE LA COURTINE - OFFICIER D'ASTREINTE
    - TEL : 06 08 56 46 89 OU 06 08 56 46 92.
    F) SFC
    G) 500FT AGL

    11. 515243N 0230242E

    13. 504458N 0232149E
    14. 503916N 0232200E
    15. 502621N 0232241E
    16. 494918N 0222539E
    17. 493446N 0221542E
    18. 492634N 0221555E
    19. 491613N 0221611E
    20. 490739N 0222325E
    THEN ALONG THE STATE BORDER TO THE POINT:
    1. 535759N 0233016E
    VERTICAL LIMITS:
    GND - FL095
    WITHIN AREA:
    1. FM SS TO SR AIRSPACE UNCLASSIFIED.
    2. FM SS TO SR ALL FLIGHTS ARE PROHIBITED EXC MILITARY ACFT
    3. FM SS TO SR ALL FLIGHTS ARE PROHIBITED EXC TAKE OFF AND LANDING
    TO/FROM EPCD IN COORDINATION WITH AIR OPERATIONS CENTER - AIR
    COMPONENT COMMAND (COP-DKP).
    4. FM SR TO SS ALL FLIGHTS ARE PROHIBITED EXC:
     - FLIGHTS OF MANNED ACFT OPERATED AFTER FILLING A FLIGHT PLAN,
    EQUIPPED WITH A WORKING TRANSPONDER OPERATING IN MODE A AND C,
    OR IN MODE S, MAINTAINING CONTINUOUS AIR-GROUND AUDIO MONITORING
    WITH THE APPROPRIATE ATS UNIT AND IF NECESSARY, ESTABLISHING
    TWO-WAY COMMUNICATION ON THE APPROPRIATE COMMUNICATION CHANNEL
    OF THE APPROPRIATE ATS UNIT,
    - MILITARY ACFT,
    - GARDA, ALPHA SCRAMBLE FLIGHTS
    - WITH HEAD, STATE, FFR, HOSP, MEDEVAC, SAR STATUS.
    - CIVIL UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES EXC ADIZ BIALORUS AND ADIZ UKRAINE
    AFTER COORDINATION WITH DUTY OPERATIONS CENTRE - AIR FORCES
    OPERATIONS CENTRE (PHONE: +48 261 828 202) FLIGHTS
    THAT DO NOT MEET THE ABOVE CRITERIA MAY BE PERMITTED:
    - STATE AVIATION FLIGHTS AND FLIGHTS OF AIR MEDICAL RESCUE (LPR),
    - OPERATIONS TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE IN CASE OF ENDANGERED LIFE OR
    HEALTH HUMANS OR ANIMALS, ESPECIALLY DURING NATURAL DISASTERS,
    DISASTERS, ECOLOGICAL DANGERS OR EMERGENCY SITUATIONS.
    - FLIGHTS RELATED TO THE PROTECTION AND CONTROL OF CRITICAL
    INFRASTRUCTURE.
    F) GND
    G) FL095

    CAZAUX ET ARCACHON POUR DES EVOLUTIONS D'AERONEFS D'ETAT SANS
    EQUIPAGE A BORD

    JOUR

    CERCLE DE 3NM DE RAYON CENTRE SUR 443500N 0010857W

    PORTIONS D'ESPACES AERIENS AVEC LESQUELS ELLE INTERFERE.
    3- CONDITIONS DE PENETRATION :
    CAG/CAM, CONTOURNEMENT OBLIGATOIRE SAUF POUR :
    - LES AERONEFS D'ETAT SANS EQUIPAGE A BORD MIS EN OEUVRE PAR LE
    GESTIONNAIRE
    - LES AERONEFS EFFECTUANT DES ACTIVITES MILITAIRES, DE DOUANE, DE
    POLICE, DE RECHERCHE ET SAUVETAGE, DE LUTTE CONTRE LES INCENDIES, DU
    TRANSPORT MEDICAL AYANT A INTERVENIR DANS LE CADRE DE L'EXECUTION DE
    LEURS MISSIONS ET LORSQUE CELLES-CI NE PERMETTENT PAS LE
    CONTOURNEMENT DE LA ZONE APRES NOTIFICATION AUPRES DU DIRECTEUR D'
    EXERCICE
    4- SERVICES RENDUS:
    CAM/CAG : INFORMATION DE VOL ET ALERTE
    5- GESTIONNAIRE :
    DIRECTEUR D'EXERCICE
    6- INFO :
    ACTIVITE REELLE CONNUE DE :
    CAZAUX TWR : 118.400MHZ
    ARCACHON INFO : 119.080MHZ
    AQUITAINE INFO : 120.575MHZ

    ELLES INTERFERENT,

    DIEUZE ET DE LA LF-R 228 A BITCHE LORSQU'ELLES SONT ACTIVES.'

    UNPLANNED MILITARY ACTIVITY RELATED TO ENSURING STATE SECURITY CAN
    BE EXPECTED WITHIN THE AREA. IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT ACFT PERFORMING
    FLIGHTS IN UNCONTROLLED CLASS G AIRSPACE PUBLISHED IN AIP POLAND IN
    FIS AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY MAINTAIN AIR-GROUND AUDIO MONITORING ON
    PROPER FIS FREQ. ADDITIONALLY IT IS RECOMMENDED TO TURN ON SSR
    TRANSPONDER MODE A,C OR S.
    F) GND
    G) FL095

EDMO EDMO-FLUGBETRIEB GMBH

    EDDZ-D1938/21
    DU: 03 08 2021 12:26 AU: PERM
    A) EDMO
    Q) EDMM / QWULW / IV / BO / AW / 000/030 / 4805N01119E001
    E) MON-FRI EXC HOL SR BUT NOT EARLIER THAN 0600 (0500) TIL SS BUT
    NOT
    LATER THAN 1800 (1700) AND ONLY DURING ACTIVITY OF CTR.
    UAV (UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE) TEST FLIGHT OPERATION IN SEVERAL
    VLOS (VISUAL LINE OF SIGHT) FLIGHT BOXES LOCATED AT THE AD AND S AND
    E OF AD WITHIN CTR OBERPFAFFENHOFEN.
    INFORMATION ABOUT ACTUAL ACTIVITY CAN BE REQUESTED VIA
    OBERPFAFFENHOFEN TOWER FREQ 119.555MHZ.
    DURING ACTIVITY OTHER VFR TRAFFIC EXCEPT FLIGHTS WITH PRIORITY
    STATUS WILL BE HELD CLEAR OF THE FLIGHT BOXES AND WILL GET TRAFFIC
    INFORMATION BY OBERPFAFFENHOFEN TOWER.
    F) GND
    G) 3000FT AMSL
